data.text: @trupunzel @ClintVSmith Well I think we have heard much from Cindy about empathy and kindness but little actual evidence of it.

@ClintVSmith That was totally sufficient on covid. He was talking about the nation. If Cindy gave as much focus to the nation as she does to covid we would be better off. Though with her failure to deliver that might be a bit hopeful.

@ClintVSmith Yeah, apparently empathy solves zero problems... mental health, housing, kiwibuild, poverty...
All have had an abundance of empathy and all have got worse.
@ClintVSmith It’s called reality, nothing bizarre about it.

@zebbidi975 @ClintVSmith @jacindaardern Because unlike you, I expect our politicians to put their humanity ahead of their politics. Previous politicians, with grit, empathy and more did under far worse circumstances. And Jacinda even gave a similar protest $30,000,000! https://t.co/ZUI7ZPvPpm

@ClintVSmith Hm.. he’s right though. There’s supply-chain delays, labour shortage, inflation, gun violence in Auckland downtown, mental health crisis, housing shortage… The government can’t keep ignoring these issues.
@ClintVSmith The troll that was so bad at his job even Cindy sacked him is back. Welcome back Clinto. Your ship has sunk

@ClintVSmith And what’s Ardern done?
Made us wait months more than we had to for vaccines. Devastated our economy and health agendas for years to come.

@ClintVSmith Do we focus on the everyday deaths from other causes?
Gang supplied drugs (financed by Liebour), Cancer (delays to screening), Heart Disease (no ICU beds available)
